Text:
i have the previous cracked steam version(22.8.12) how i update it?
and i loose my games with this update?
required allways to have internet connection?
can i play multiplayer?

now i am getting an error when i go to install a game(i tried 3)
''An error occurapted while installing Ghost Recon future soldier(no subscription) 
plz help

sorry for u, but am sure u did not install the CS correctly that's why, so u have to reinstall it and follow ths steps 1 by 1, and yes u must register to play multiplayer, also some games needs some files before beginning downloading them.
if you need ncfg cfg file for download game wisith http://freesteam.org/forums/gcfs-ncfs-game-files/
